title: The Indian Bills of Lading Act 1856
description: Regulates the rights, liabilities, and responsibilities of carriers and shippers under bills of lading.

title: The Provisional Collection of Taxes Act, 2023
description: Provides legal authority for the provisional collection of taxes before the enactment of the annual Finance Act.

title: The Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019
description: Reorganises the state of Jammu & Kashmir into two Union Territories: Jammu & Kashmir and Ladakh.

title: The Export-Import Bank of India Act, 1981
description: Establishes the Export-Import Bank of India to provide financial assistance for export and import trade.

title: The Negotiable Instruments Act, 1881
description: Defines the law relating to negotiable instruments such as promissory notes, bills of exchange, and cheques.

title: The King of Oudh's Estate Validation Act, 1917
description: Validates and confirms estate rights and transfers in the former Kingdom of Oudh.

title: The Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act, 2005
description: Guarantees at least 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to rural households.

title: The National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development Act, 2021
description: Establishes a bank to finance infrastructure projects and development in India.

title: The Delhi Sales Tax Act, 1975
description: Regulates the levy and collection of sales tax on goods in Delhi.

title: The Bengal Land Revenue Sales Act, 1859
description: Governs the sale and recovery of land revenue in Bengal.

title: The Coast Guard Act, 1978
description: Provides for the establishment, functions, and duties of the Indian Coast Guard.

title: The Companies Act, 2013
description: Regulates incorporation, management, and governance of companies in India.

title: The Delhi Municipal Corporation Act, 1957
description: Governs the administration and functions of municipal corporations in Delhi.

title: The Income-tax Act, 1961
description: Governs taxation of income for individuals and entities in India.
